summary: Relating to the Department of Administrative Services; authorizing the Director to enter into Grant Agreement Number 1-95-673-039 with the State of Washington, Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development, for Mitigation Grant Project funds; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1995 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services; and making a contingent, reimbursable appropriation from the Administrative Services Fund, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
